title: Uzbek 'buy now, pay later' Islamic finance start-up raises $1 million funding - Reuters
content: Uzbek 'buy now, pay later' Islamic finance start-up raises $1 million funding  Reuters
description: IMAN, an Uzbek company providing 'buy now, pay later' services compliant with Islamic finance rules, has raised over $1 million from a group of venture capital investors, aiming to grow in Central Asia's most populous nation.
